description: SurveyMonkey is an online survey development platform that enables users to create, distribute, and analyze surveys for various purposes.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_CREATE_SURVEY
capabilities.description: Tool to create a new survey. Use when you have a survey title and need an ID for follow-up operations. Example: "Create a survey titled 'Customer Satisfaction'"

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_DELETE_SURVEY
capabilities.description: Tool to delete a specific survey. Use when the survey ID is confirmed correct. Deletion is irreversible. Example prompt: "Delete survey '123456789'."

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_COLLECTORS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of collectors for a specific survey. Use when you need collector URLs, counts, and statuses.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_CONTACTS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of contacts. Use after authenticating with SurveyMonkey. Call this to fetch all contacts associated with your account.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_GROUPS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of groups. Use after authentication when you need to enumerate or paginate through all groups in your SurveyMonkey account.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_RESPONSES
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of responses for a specific survey. Use when you need to browse or filter responses after confirming the survey ID.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_SURVEY_DETAILS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve metadata and counts for a specific survey. Use after confirming the survey ID.

capabilities.name: SURVEY_MONKEY_GET_SURVEYS
capabilities.description: Tool to retrieve a list of surveys. Use when you need to enumerate or paginate through all surveys.
